column4: I just started playing with screen and realized I had inadvertently created a bunch of sessions without knowing what I was doing.  I then figured I'd wipe them out by doing "rm /var/run/screen/S-adam/*" which I'm now realizing was maybe not so smart.  Apparently the sessions are still "alive" but I can't reattach to them now -- any advice?
ohh cool. A group of my friends were using the word lucid+name a while back for a bunch of projects we were working on
